Name: Futa Jigsaw Dating
About the game: Futa Jigsaw Dating is a puzzle game about making love to futanari characters. You have to place the pieces of the jigsaw so that all the pictures show sexy futas having fun. Featuring both futa on male and futa on female scenes. Your task is to put together puzzle pieces of beautiful futa girls as you progress through dating them. In each stage you choose which girls you like and would wish to progress with further. Every girl has her personality and unique information to uncover. The more stages you complete, the more girls are revealed in your gallery! Features: - Relaxing and addictive gameplay. - 5 futa characters to date. - Sexy artwork for many different scenes. - Explicit sexual content with both futa on male and futa on female. - Great Music. There is no time limit or a way to lose. The game was designed to be relaxing and you will enjoy every minute of playing it. Gameplay consists of a series of jigsaw puzzles where after each puzzle you progress with a given futanari girl and unlock a bit of information about her, as well as some images.
